item.title: Publications
item.description: For a full list of publications, please visit my Google Scholar. Book Chapters Deep Learning and Unsupervised Domain Adaptation for WiFi-based Sensing Jianfei Yang, Han Zou, Lihua Xie and Costas J. Spanos In Generalization With Deep Learning: For Improvement On Sensing Capability, World Scientific, 2021 Journal Publications IOT-J EfficientFi: Towards Large-Scale Lightweight WiFi Sensing via CSI Compression Jianfei Yang, Xinyan Chen, Han Zou, Dazhuo Wang, Lihua Xie
